import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Form, Row, Col, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; function Signup() { const [userInfo,setuserInfo] = useState({}) function handleChange(e){ setuserInfo([...userInfo, [e.target.name] = e.target.value]) } return (
Create your account
Name Email address Password
Already have the account Sign In
 ); } export default Signup;
